00010 #include <iostream>

00012 using namespace std;
00013 using namespace boost;

00016 NS_IZENELIB_UTIL_BEGIN
00017 
00018 typedef string badparamname_info_type;
00019 typedef string badparamvalue_info_type;
00020 typedef string functionname_info_type;
00021 typedef string returncode_info_type;
00022 
00023 typedef boost::error_info<struct tag_badparamname, badparamname_info_type> badparamname_info;
00024 typedef boost::error_info<struct tag_badparamvalue, badparamvalue_info_type> badparamvalue_info;
00025 typedef boost::tuple<badparamname_info, badparamvalue_info> badparam_info;
00026 
00027 typedef boost::error_info<struct tag_functionname, functionname_info_type> functionname_info;
00028 typedef boost::error_info<struct tag_returncode, returncode_info_type> returncode_info;
00029 typedef boost::tuple<functionname_info, returncode_info> badreturncode_info;

00031 
00032 class IZENELIBException : public boost::exception, public std::exception
00033 {
00034 public:
00035     enum ExceptionCode
00036     {
00037         ERROR_UNKNOWN,
00038         ERROR_GENERIC,
00039         ERROR_MISSING_PARAMETER,
00040         ERROR_BAD_PARAMETER,
00041         ERROR_FILEIO,
00042         ERROR_RUNTIME,
00043         ERROR_OUTOFMEM,
00044         ERROR_ILLEGALARGUMENT,
00045         ERROR_UNSUPPORTED,
00046         ERROR_OUTOFRANGE,
00047         NUM_ERRORS
00048     };
00049     IZENELIBException(ExceptionCode code, string d="") throw()
00050     {
00051         string ss = s_errorStrings[code];
00052         detail = ss+":"+d;
00053     }
00054     IZENELIBException(string d="") throw():detail(d) {}
00055 
00056     ~IZENELIBException() throw() {}
00057 
00058 public:
00059     virtual const char* what() const throw ()
00060     {
00061         string ret="";
00062 
00063         if (getDetail().compare("")!=0)
00064             ret += "\n" + getDetail();
00065 
00066         boost::shared_ptr<const char* const> func = boost::get_error_info<boost::throw_function>(*this);
00067         boost::shared_ptr<const char* const> file = boost::get_error_info<boost::throw_file>(*this);
00068         boost::shared_ptr<const int> line = boost::get_error_info<boost::throw_line>(*this);
00069         if (func.get()!=0 && file.get()!=0 && line.get()!=0)
00070         {
00071             std::stringstream out;
00072             out << "\n\tInfo: " << *func << " in file " << *file << "(l. " << *line << ")\n";
00073             ret += out.str();
00074         }
00075 
00076         return ret.c_str();
00077     }
00078 
00079     string getDetail() const throw()
00080     {
00081         return detail;
00082     }
00083 
00084 protected:
00085     string detail;
00086 
00087     static const char* s_errorStrings[NUM_ERRORS];
00088 };
00089 
00090 const char* IZENELIBException::s_errorStrings[NUM_ERRORS] =
00091 {
00092     "Unknown error",                    //UNKNOWN_ERROR
00093     "Generic error",                    //GENERIC_ERROR
00094     "Missing parameter",                //MISSING_PARAMETER_ERROR
00095     "Bad parameter",                    //BAD_PARAMETER_ERROR
00096     "File I/O error",                   //FILEIO_ERROR
00097     "Rumtime error",                    //RUNTIME_ERROR
00098     "Out of memory",                    //OUTOFMEM_ERROR
00099     "Illegal argument",                 //ILLEGALARGUMENT_ERROR
00100     "Unsupported operation",            //UNSUPPORTED_ERROR
00101     "Out of range",                     //OUTOFRANG_ERROR
00102 };
